name: Adult Imperial Dragon
movement: fly 80 ft., walk 40 ft., swim 40 ft.
description: The Adult Imperial Dragon is a vast and powerful creature with shimmering scales and imposing features. It has a strong, muscular build, and its size and presence command authority. The dragon wields a fearsome bite, claws, and a long tail, showcasing its strength.
memorable: The dragon has the ability to charm creatures with its Mesmerizing Presence, and it can unleash a devastating Lightning Breath attack, making it both beautiful and deadly.
goals: Typically seeks power, dominance, and control over territories or creatures.
relations: Usually encountered in the company of other dragons or as a master to lesser creatures.
environment: Can be found in mountainous regions, coastal areas, and near deep water.
strengths: It has high physical and magical capabilities, with significant damage immunities and impressive spellcasting skills.
weaknesses: Relatively low Dexterity makes it less agile than other creatures.
attacks: The dragon can perform multiattack actions using its dangerous bite, claws, and tail, along with charming nearby foes.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to exhale devastating lightning breath in a wide line, causing massive damage to multiple targets.
senses: The dragon possesses blindsight and has an exceptional passive Perception score of 25, allowing it to detect enemies effectively.
skills: It is proficient in Arcana, History, Insight, and has high Perception, showcasing its intelligence and awareness.
additional_information: Innate spellcaster with a DC of 18 for spell save.
Amphibious; can breathe in both air and water.
Legendary Resistance allows it to shrug off failed saving throws.
Change Shape ability grants it versatility in form.
Truespeak enables it to communicate with any creature.
spellcasting: Can innately cast spells without material components, including fog cloud, control weather, and others.
test_queries: huge dragon capable of changing shape
